events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on April 28th involving their sedan and another vehicle in a parking lot.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords like vehicle collision and car accident.
An experienced agent was assigned to this vehicle collision claim to assist the insured with further procedures.
The claim acknowledgement notice was sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim.
Customer was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates.
Customer provided all requested documentation including detailed photos, official police report, and repair bills.
The investigation team began assessing the collision details, verifying the authenticity of submitted documents.
Investigation confirmed that the customerâ€™s vehicle was at fault and estimated damages were accurate.
A settlement proposal was sent to the customer outlining compensation for vehicle repairs post-accident.
Customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the claim handling process.
The claim was officially approved, authorizing payment to cover repair costs for the damaged vehicle.
Payment for the approved settlement was processed and issued to the repair shop as agreed with the customer.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after confirmation that all payments were received and repairs completed.
All documentation and correspondence related to this car collision claim were archived for record-keeping purposes.
